BNC User Reference Guide

<creation>

creation contains information about the creation of a text.
Declaration 
element creation { attribute date { data.temporal }?, macro.phraseSeq }
Attributes
(In addition to global attributes)
date supplies the year of original composition, if known; or 000-00-00 if the date is unknown.
Status: Optional
Datatype (1–1) data.temporal
Example
 <creation date="0000-00-00"
xmlns:xaira="http://www.xaira.org/ns/1.0/spec"
xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"
xmlns:rng="http://relaxng.org/ns/structure/1.0"> Origination/creation date not known </creation>
Example
 <creation date="1986"
xmlns:xaira="http://www.xaira.org/ns/1.0/spec"
xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"
xmlns:rng="http://relaxng.org/ns/structure/1.0"> Original publisher: A & C Black (Publishers) Ltd, London </creation>
;
